title: IDEA启动游戏时报错
author: Yty1031
txt_content:
如题，错误信息如下：Cannot start compiler: the SDK is not specified for module "Gemcraft".Specify the SDK at Project Structure dialog.
     然后我点了OK，结果弹出的这个是神马，怎么办？

replies.author: trychen
replies.txt_content: 应该是没添加JDK，IDEA不会自动添加= =

replies.author: Yty1031
replies.txt_content:
gamerteam 发表于 2015-8-28 10:40
JAVA_HOME设置没，IDEA不像eclipse自带JDK的…………
JDK安好的呀，我JRE和JDK都有的，而且都是1.7
